PAYMENT.TRANSACTION_PAID: The transaction has been paid. Please make sure you are paying for the correct transaction
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You have insufficient balance to pay the transaction. Please make sure you have enough balance in your wallet to continue
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE_TO_EXECUTE_TRANSACT: You have insufficient balance to execute the transaction. Please transfer at least %s ETH to your wallet %s to continue.
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_ETH_IN_SYSTEM_WALLET: The system wallet does not have enough ether to process the request
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_KADIMA_IN_CONSUMER_WALLET: The consumer wallet does not have enough kadima to process the request, Please request him to transfer at least %s Kadima to his wallet %s to continue.
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_KADIMA_IN_SYSTEM_WALLET: The system wallet does not have enough kadima to process the request
PAYMENT.TRANSACTION_IN_PROCESS: The payment for the transaction is already in progress
PAYMENT.TRANSACTION_NOT_PAID: The transaction has not been paid. Please make sure the transaction is paid to send email invoice

PRODUCT.NOT_ACTIVE: Please select a valid active product to continue

REQ_ERRORS.INVALID_ID: Request could not be resolved as provided ID is invalid
